/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The sky above is a serene blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The street below is a hive of activity, filled with a variety of vehicles including cars, buses, and taxis. The buildings that line the street are tall and modern, their facades painted in shades of white and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. The perspective of the image is particularly striking, taken from a low angle that looks up towards the towering buildings and the expansive sky, creating a sense of depth and scale.
